version_description:
Welcome to the latest Pencil Planner! We have a few exciting features available with this update:

* Text notes!
* with rich editing -- headers, markup, lists, checklists, etc.
* Link notes to days & events
* Access linked notes from the day / week / month tabs
* Quick action buttons for creating notes and events
* Notes are automatically placed into the current folder and linked to today
* Fullscreen mode provided for calendar views

Other new features:

* Event font size adjustment setting
* Increased line height options on notes
* A couple other minor bug fixes and features

Please see our feature roadmap for upcoming features: https://pencilplanner.app/roadmap/ 

If you have any questions or issues, please email us at support@pencilplanner.app

Small improvements in language support

Please see our feature roadmap for upcoming features: https://pencilplanner.app/roadmap/ 

If you have any questions or issues, please email us at support@pencilplanner.app
